title: Starting an Amazon FBM Business
description: This self-learning plan provides a step-by-step guide for starting an Amazon FBM business, including key topics, learning objectives, and weekly tasks.

weeks.title: Introduction to Amazon FBM
learningObjectives: Understand the Amazon FBM model and its benefits
Learn about the Amazon seller account setup process
Familiarize with Amazon's policies and requirements for FBM sellers
weeklyTasks: Review Amazon's FBM policies and requirements
Identify potential product categories to sell on Amazon
resources: Amazon Seller Central documentation on FBM
Online tutorials and guides on starting an Amazon FBM business

weeks.title: Product Research and Sourcing
learningObjectives: Conduct thorough product research to identify profitable opportunities
Learn effective strategies for sourcing products from suppliers
Understand the importance of product pricing and profit margins
weeklyTasks: Conduct product research and identify potential products to sell
Reach out to potential suppliers and negotiate wholesale prices
Determine optimal pricing for selected products
resources: Online tools for product research (e.g., Jungle Scout, Helium 10)
Guides on effective supplier sourcing and negotiation

weeks.title: Inventory Management and Fulfillment
learningObjectives: Understand the importance of efficient inventory management
Learn about the fulfillment process for FBM sellers
Develop a plan for handling customer orders and returns
weeklyTasks: Research and select a fulfillment solution (e.g., in-house, third-party logistics)
Create a customer service and returns policy
resources: Guides on inventory management for FBM sellers
Information on fulfillment options and third-party logistics providers

weeks.title: Marketing and Sales Optimization
learningObjectives: Develop effective product listings and marketing strategies
Understand Amazon's advertising and promotion tools
Learn how to analyze and optimize sales performance
topicsToCover: Sales data analysis and performance optimization
weeklyTasks: Create and optimize product listings for selected products
Set up Amazon advertising campaigns and monitor performance
Develop a strategy for managing customer reviews and feedback
resources: Guides on Amazon product listing optimization
Information on Amazon advertising and promotion tools
Resources on sales data analysis and performance optimization
